fields.name: Spotless Face Wash
fields.description: A deep cleansing face wash specifically formulated for acne-prone and oily skin. It effectively removes dirt, excess oil, and impurities to rejuvenate dull skin and prevent future breakouts.
fields.key_benefits:
- Deeply cleanses for clear, even-toned skin
- Helps reduce blemishes, dark spots, and pigmentation
- Gently exfoliates to unclog pores
- Controls excess oil production
- Smoothens and softens skin texture
fields.key_features:
- Prevents Acne
- Gentle Exfoliation
- Unclogs Pores & Controls Oil
- pH-Balanced Formula
fields.ingredients: Aqua, Salicylic Acid, Tea Tree Oil, Niacinamide, Glycerin, Cocamidopropyl Betaine, Sodium Lauroyl Sarcosinate.
fields.how_to_use: Apply a small amount to your wet face and gently massage with your fingertips in a circular motion. Rinse off with water and pat dry. Use twice daily for best results.

fields.name: WhiteWave Face Wash
fields.description: A soap-free, gentle cleanser designed for skin brightening and hydration. Its unique formula provides anti-pigmentation action while boosting moisture for a radiant complexion.
fields.key_benefits:
- Brightens skin tone and improves evenness
- Provides anti-pigmentation action to reduce dark spots
- Delivers a powerful hydration and moisture boost
- Offers antioxidant protection against environmental damage
- Deep yet gentle cleanse suitable for sensitive skin
fields.key_features:
- Skin Brightening Complex
- Soap-Free Formula
- Hydration & Moisture Boost
- Antioxidant Protection
fields.ingredients: Aqua, Vitamin C (Ethyl Ascorbic Acid), Licorice Extract, Mulberry Extract, Glycerin, Sodium Hyaluronate.
fields.how_to_use: Moisten face, apply a small quantity of face wash, and gently work up a lather using a circular motion. Wash off and pat dry. Use daily.

fields.name: Glowing C Vitamin C Face Serum
fields.description: A high-potency antioxidant serum formulated with Pure Vitamin C (Ascorbic Acid) to boost collagen production, fade dark spots, and protect against sun damage for a revitalized, even skin tone.
fields.key_benefits:
- Boosts collagen production for firmer skin
- Fades dark spots, pigmentation, and sun damage
- Provides powerful antioxidant protection
- Hydrates and revitalizes for a radiant glow
- Evens out skin tone and texture
fields.key_features:
- Pure Vitamin C (Ascorbic Acid)
- High-Potency Formula
- Hydrating & Revitalizing
- Lightweight & Fast-Absorbing
fields.ingredients: Aqua, Ascorbic Acid (Vitamin C), Ferulic Acid, Hyaluronic Acid, Vitamin E, Glycerin, Witch Hazel Extract.
fields.how_to_use: After cleansing and toning, apply 2-3 drops of serum to your face and neck. Gently pat it into the skin. Use in the morning before sunscreen.

fields.name: Luminaa Skin Whitening Cream
fields.description: A multi-action cream with an advanced whitening complex to lighten skin tone, control pigmentation, and provide long-lasting moisture for a youthful, glowing appearance.
fields.key_benefits:
- Lightens and brightens overall skin tone
- Reduces dark spots, hyperpigmentation, and unevenness
- Provides long-lasting moisture and hydration
- Boosts skin with an antioxidant-rich formula
- Promotes a youthful and glowing complexion
fields.key_features:
- Advanced Whitening Complex
- Pigmentation Control
- Non-Greasy & Fast-Absorbing
- Safe & Gentle Formula
fields.ingredients: Aqua, Kojic Acid, Arbutin, Vitamin E, Niacinamide, Shea Butter, Titanium Dioxide.
fields.how_to_use: Apply evenly to face and neck after cleansing. Gently massage in an upward circular motion. For best results, use twice daily.

fields.name: Moisturize Me Moisturizer
fields.description: A daily moisturizer providing intense, 24-hour hydration and skin barrier repair. Formulated with SPF 30, it soothes irritation and improves skin texture while protecting from UV damage.
fields.key_benefits:
- Provides 24-hour moisture lock (lasts up to 48 hours)
- Restores the skin's natural moisture barrier
- Soothes irritation and dryness
- Improves skin texture and increases radiance
- Offers SPF 30 UV protection
fields.key_features:
- 24-Hour Moisture Lock
- Barrier Repair Formula
- Lightweight & Non-Greasy
- SPF 30 UV Protection
fields.ingredients: Aqua, Hyaluronic Acid, Ceramides, Glycerin, Octinoxate, Zinc Oxide, Shea Butter.
fields.how_to_use: Apply liberally to the face and neck 15 minutes before sun exposure. Reapply at least every 2 hours. Use daily as the last step in your skincare routine.
fields.suitable_for: All Skin Types, including Sensitive & Acne-Prone

fields.name: UV Armor Tinted Sunscreen
fields.description: A broad-spectrum SPF 50+ sunscreen that protects against UVA, UVB, and blue light. Its lightweight, tinted formula provides a natural, even-toned finish, making it ideal for daily use.
fields.key_benefits:
- Prevents sunburn, premature aging, and tanning
- Provides a natural, even-toned finish with a light tint
- Water and sweat-resistant for long-lasting protection
- Non-comedogenic formula won't clog pores
- Leaves no white cast
fields.key_features:
- Broad-Spectrum SPF 50+
- Tinted Coverage
- Lightweight & Non-Greasy
- Antioxidant Boost
fields.ingredients: Aqua, Zinc Oxide, Titanium Dioxide, Vitamin E, Iron Oxides, Niacinamide, Cyclopentasiloxane.
fields.how_to_use: Apply generously and evenly to all exposed skin 15 minutes before sun exposure. Reapply frequently, especially after swimming, sweating, or towel drying.

fields.name: HairSurance Shampoo + Conditioner
fields.description: A 2-in-1 formula that gently cleanses while deeply nourishing and hydrating. It controls hair fall, reduces frizz, and restores vitality for thicker, fuller, and more manageable hair.
fields.key_benefits:
- Controls hair fall and nourishes follicles
- Restores vitality for thicker and fuller hair
- Adds shine, softness, and manageability
- Reduces frizz and tangles for a smooth, silky finish
- Protects hair from styling, heat, and environmental damage
fields.key_features:
- Controls Hair Fall
- Nourishes Hair Follicles
- Frizz & Tangle Reduction
- Suitable for Daily Use
fields.ingredients: Aqua, Keratin, Argan Oil, Biotin, Caffeine, Sodium Lauroyl Sarcosinate, Cocamidopropyl Betaine.
fields.how_to_use: Apply to wet hair, lather, and gently massage the scalp and hair. Leave on for 2-3 minutes, then rinse thoroughly. No need for a separate conditioner.
fields.suitable_for: All Hair Types, including Damaged & Color-Treated

fields.name: Bollywood Hair Serum
fields.description: A multi-benefit serum with advanced hair growth actives to reduce hair fall and thinning. Its non-greasy formula adds instant shine, controls frizz, and protects hair from heat and pollution.
fields.key_benefits:
- Reduces hair fall and thinning
- Strengthens hair from root to tip
- Promotes thicker, fuller, and healthier-looking hair
- Adds instant shine and smoothness
- Protects hair from heat, pollution, and styling damage
fields.key_features:
- Advanced Hair Growth Actives
- Frizz Control
- Non-Greasy Formula
- Heat Protection
fields.ingredients: Cyclopentasiloxane, Dimethiconol, Vitamin E, Argan Oil, Jojoba Oil, Fragrance.
fields.how_to_use: Take a few drops of serum onto your palms and apply evenly through damp or dry hair, focusing on the mid-lengths and ends. Style as desired.

fields.name: Raindrops Shower Gel
fields.description: A hydrating and refreshing body wash for daily use. Its gentle, non-drying formula cleanses and energizes the skin, leaving it feeling soft, smooth, and revitalized.
fields.key_benefits:
- Gently cleanses and hydrates the skin
- Ideal for daily use to refresh and energize
- Leaves skin feeling soft, smooth, and refreshed
- Non-drying and antioxidant-rich formula
fields.key_features:
- Gentle Cleansing Formula
- Hydrating & Nourishing
- Refreshing Fragrance
- Antioxidant-Rich
fields.ingredients: Aqua, Aloe Vera Extract, Green Tea Extract, Glycerin, Sodium Laureth Sulfate, Cocamidopropyl Betaine.
fields.how_to_use: Pour a small amount onto a wet loofah or your palm. Apply gently over wet skin to create a lather and rinse off.

fields.name: Lip Lock Lip Balm
fields.description: A nourishing lip balm that provides deep, long-lasting hydration. It protects lips from harsh weather, heals irritation, and soothes dryness for soft, healthy lips.
fields.key_benefits:
- Moisturizes dry and chapped lips
- Provides long-lasting hydration
- Protects lips from sun, wind, and cold
- Heals and soothes irritated lips
fields.key_features:
- Deep Hydration & Moisture
- Protects Against Harsh Weather
- Natural Oils for Nourishment
- Gentle & Non-Irritating
fields.ingredients: Beeswax, Shea Butter, Cocoa Butter, Jojoba Oil, Vitamin E, SPF 15.
fields.how_to_use: Apply liberally to lips as often as needed, particularly in dry, cold, or windy conditions.
